Segmentation.maskcreatdemo module#

Interactive tool to draw mask on an image or image-like array. Adapted from matplotlib/examples/event_handling/poly_editor.py

class Segmentation.maskcreatdemo.MaskCreator(ax, poly_xy=None, max_ds=10)[source]#

Bases: object

An interactive polygon editor. :type poly_xy: :param poly_xy: List of (x, y) coordinates used as vertices of the polygon. :type poly_xy: list of (float, float) :type max_ds: :param max_ds: Max pixel distance to count as a vertex hit. :type max_ds: float :param Key-bindings: :param ————: :param ‘t’: you can move them, delete them :type ‘t’: toggle vertex markers on and off. When vertex markers are on, :param ‘d’: :type ‘d’: delete the vertex under point :param ‘i’: line connecting two existing vertices :type ‘i’: insert a vertex at point. You must be within max_ds of the

Segmentation.maskcreatdemo.dist_point_to_segment(p, s0, s1)[source]#
Get the distance of a point to a segment.

p, s0, s1 are xy sequences

This algorithm from http://www.geomalgorithms.com/algorithms.html
